resources.string: Congratulations, you have finished all the setups. Click the button below to start using Kaleidoscope.

Kaleidoscope has build-in Google Services with dynamic switch support, which means you are able to control the existence of them by simply switching the toggle below. You can find the same toggle later in \"Settings > Apps\" after finishing the setup. And remember that do not flash extra GMS packages to avoid breaking any stuff.
Enable Google Mobile Services so you are able to use apps that rely on them.
